autumn.util.data.json

Interface JsonValue

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JsonArray, JsonBoolean, JsonMap, JsonNull, JsonNumber
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConcreteJsonArray, ConcreteJsonBoolean, ConcreteJsonMap, ConcreteJsonNull, ConcreteJsonNumber

    public interface JsonValue
extends java.io.Serializable
    An instance of this interface is a part of a JSON data tree.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enforce(JsonTypeSystem structure)
      This method applies a type-system to this value; thereby, causing this value to be typed.
      boolean isArray()
      This method determines whether this object represents a JSON array.

      This method determines whether this object represents a JSON boolean value.

      This method determines whether this object represents a JSON null value.

      This method determines whether this object represents a JSON string.
      void print(java.io.PrintStream out)
      This method prints the string representation of this value to an output-stream.
      java.lang.String toString()
      This method creates the string representation of this JSON value.
      JsonTypeSystem typesystem()
      This method retrieves the type-system that this object obeys.

    • Method Detail

      • enforce

        void enforce(JsonTypeSystem structure)
        This method applies a type-system to this value; thereby, causing this value to be typed.
        Parameters:
        structure - is the type-system that this object must subsequently obey (may be null).

      • typesystem

        JsonTypeSystem typesystem()
        This method retrieves the type-system that this object obeys.
        Returns:
        the obeyed type-system, or null, if this object is untyped.

      • isArray

        boolean isArray()
        This method determines whether this object represents a JSON array.
        Returns:
        true, iff this object represents a JSON array.

      • isBoolean

        boolean isBoolean()
        This method determines whether this object represents a JSON boolean value.
        Returns:
        true, iff this object represents a JSON boolean value.

      • isNumber

        boolean isNumber()
        This method determines whether this object represents a JSON numeric value.
        Returns:
        true, iff this object represents a JSON numeric value.

      • isNull

        boolean isNull()
        This method determines whether this object represents a JSON null value.
        Returns:
        true, iff this object represents a JSON null value.

      • isMap

        boolean isMap()
        This method determines whether this object represents a JSON map.
        Returns:
        true, iff this object represents a JSON map.

      • isString

        boolean isString()
        This method determines whether this object represents a JSON string.
        Returns:
        true, iff this object represents a JSON string.

      • print

        void print(java.io.PrintStream out)
        This method prints the string representation of this value to an output-stream.
        Parameters:
        out - is the output-stream.

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        This method creates the string representation of this JSON value.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the parsable string representation of this value.
